comments.body:
Could it be ``noarch`` ?
```suggestion
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps -vv"
  noarch: python
```

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +12,16 @@build:
  number: 0
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps -vv"
  noarch: python

comments.body:
Please add the ``license_file``
You will have to package this license manually. 

Please see
https://conda-forge.org/docs/maintainer/adding_pkgs.html#packaging-the-license-manually

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +30,34 @@  home: https://github.com/joseph-fox/python-bloomfilter
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE.txt
  summary: 'Scalable Bloom Filter implemented in Python'
